message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to offer it to you for $15000. This is a great opportunity to get your hands on a unique and valuable item. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to make a counteroffer. I'm thinking of a price of $13500. This is a fair compromise, considering the value the product brings to you. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $12500?

I understand your budget constraints, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to go below $14000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer you a price of $13750. This is a fair compromise, considering the value the product brings to you. What do you think?
I appreciate your persistence, but I'm really at my limit. Would you be willing to meet me at $12000?

I understand you're at your limit, Bob, but I'm still not willing to go below $14000. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer you a price of $13900. This is my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options. What do you think?
